maqras.text: alif laam raa ye ktaabe ilaahi ki aayate hai aur khole aur roushan Qur’an ki
wo bhi waqt hoga, ke kaafir apne musalmaan hone ki aarzo karenge
aap unhe khaata, nafa uthaata aur (jhoti) ummido mein mashghool hota chohd dijiye, ye khud abhi jaan lenge
kisi basti ko hum ne halaak nahi kiya magar ye ke us ke liye muqarrara navishta1 tha
koyi gruh apni mauth se na aage badta hai na piche rehta hai
unhone kaha ke aye wo shaqs jis par Qur’aan utara gaya hai yaqinan tu, to koyi diwana hai
agar tu saccha hee hai to hamaare paas farishto ko kyo nahi laata
hum farishto ko haq ke saath hee utaarte hai aur us waqt wo mahulath diye gaye nahi hote
hum ne hee is Qur’an ko naazil farmaya hai aur hum hee is ke muhaafiz hai
hum ne aap se pehle agli ummato mein bhi apne rasool (baraabar) bheje
aur (lekin) jo bhi rasool aata wo us ka mazaaq udaate
gunahgaaro ke dilo mein hum isi tarah yahi racha diya karte hai
wo us par imaan nahi laate aur yaqinan aglo ka tariqa guzra hoa hai
aur agar hum un par aasmaan ka darwaza khol bhi de aur ye waha chadne bhi lag jaaye
tab bhi yahi kahenge ke hamari nazar bandi kardi gayi hai, balke hum logo par jaadu kar diya gaya hai
yaqinan hum ne aasmaan mein burj2 banaaye hai aur dekhne walo ke liye ose sajaa diya gaya hai
aur ose har mardoodh shaitaan se mehfooz rakha hai
haan magar jo chori chupe sunne ki koshish kare us ke piche dehekta hoa (khula shola) lagta hai
aur zameen ko hum ne phaila diya hai aur us par (atal) pahaad daal diye hai aur us mein hum ne har cheez ek muayyan meghdaar se ugaadi hai
aur osi mein hum ne tumhari roziya banadi hai aur jinhe tum rozi dene wale nahi ho
aur jitni bhi cheeze hai un sub ke khazaane hamare paas hai aur hum har cheez ko us ke muqarrara andaaz se utaarte hai
aur hum bhejte hai bhujal hawaae phir aasmaan se paani barsa kar wo tumhe pilaate hai aur tum us ka zaqira karne wale nahi ho
hum hee jilaate hai aur maarte hai aur hum hee (bil aaqar) waaris hai
aur tum mein se aage badne wale aur piche hatne wale bhi hamare ilm mein hai
aap ka rab sab logo ko jama karega yaqinan wo badi hikmato wala bade ilm wala hai
yaqinan hum ne insaan ko kaali aur sadi hoyi khan-khanaati mitti se paida farmaya hai
aur us se pehle jinnaath ko hum ne loo wali aag se paida kiya
aur jab tere parvardigaar ne farishto se farmaya ke main ek insaan ko kaali aur sadi hoyi khan-khanaati mitti se paida karne wala hoon
to jab main ose pura bana chuko, aur us mein apni ruh phok doon to tum sub us ke liye sajde mein gir padna
chuna che tamaam farishto ne, sab ke sab ne sajda kar liya
magar iblees ke, ke us ne sajda karne walo mein shamuliyath karne se (saaf) inkaar kar diya
(Allah ta’ala ne) farmaya aye iblees, tujhe kya hoa ke tu sajda karne walo mein shamil na hoa
wo bola ke main aisa nahi ke is insaan ko sajda karo jise tu ne kaali aur sadi hoyi khan-khanaati mitthi se paida kiya hai
farmaya ab tu bahisht se nikal ja kyo ke tu raanda darga3 hai
aur tujh par meri phitkaar hai qayaamat ke din tak
kehne laga ke aye mere rub mujhe us din tak ki dheel de ke log dubaara utha khade kiye jaaye
farmaya ke accha tu un mein se hai jinhe muhullath mili hai
roze muqarrar tak ke waqt ki
(shaitaan ne) kaha ke aye mere rab! chu ke tu ne mujhe gumrah kiya hai mujhe bhi qasam hai ke main bhi zameen mein un ke liye mu-aasi4 ko muzayyan5 karonga aur un sab ko behkaaonga bhi
sivaae tere un bandho ke jo muntaqab kar liye gaye hai
irshaad hoa ke haan yahi mujh tak pahonchne ki sidhi raah hai
mere bandho par tujhe koi ghalba nahi lekin haan jo gumraah log teri pairvi kare
yaqinan un sub ke waade ki jageh jahannam hai
jis ke saath darwaaze hai, har darwaaze ke liye un ka ek hissa bata hoa hai
parhezgaar jannati log baagho aur chashmo mein honge
(un se kaha jayega) salaamti aur aman ke saath is mein dakhil ho jao
un ke dilo mein jo kuch ranjish wa kina tha hum sub kuch nikaal denge, wo bhai bhai bane hoye ek dosre ke aamne saamne taqto par baithe honge
na to waha unhe koi takleef cho sakti hai aur na wo wahaa se kabhi nkaale jayenge
mere bandho ko qabar de do ke main bahuth hee baqshne wala aur bada hee meherbaan hoon
